roleset.name: feel for

example.name: is it transitive when there's a preposition?
example.text: These are the sensitive souls who *trace* can empathize with *trace*-1 and even enjoy hearing about [other people's troubles]-1, no matter how haltingly or predictably the sad tale is told.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: But Mr. Guber figured that Warner Communications Inc. chairman Steven Ross, would empathize and let the producers go, knowing the Sony offer was ``the culmination of a life's work.''
example.arg: Warner Communications Inc. chairman Steven Ross,

roleset.note: EMPATHIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'empathize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from empathize.01-v predicate notes)
